description.value:
+20 to Awareness Tests when used, can make Tech-Use Test to detect things such as gasses, bio-signs, and radiation. 50m range, blocked by 50cm wall or shielded material. Good provides +30 to Test, Poor can only penetrate 20cm of material.

Effect: Scarce / Initiated

Notes: 145 T 12 R

Good provides +30 to Test, Poo
